name: PIQ-Quote
author: QStart Labs

sections.description:
Use the Pet Insurance Quotes plug-in to give your readers the opportunity to get free pet insurance quotes from multiple companies quickly and easily! Visitors to your site or blog provide basic data about their cat or dog and receive instant quotes from multiple providers, allowing your readers to compare offerings and pricing to find a plan that works for them and make an educated pet insurance purchase based on their specific needs.

The installed plug-in inserts a brief quote form on your page that, upon submission, will launch a results page that lists all the available insurance providers and their offerings. Your readers won’t lose sight of your page in the process. If your readers are pet lovers, this is a great plug-in to offer.

3rd Party Services Used

Pet Insurance Quotes

  • This Plugin is a wrapper for the pet insurance quotes tool Pet Insurance Quotes (https://www.petinsurancequotes.com/). This service will be called anytime a user fills out the embedded form and clicks ‘Fetch Your Quotes’.

  • Privacy Policy can be found at https://www.petinsurancequotes.com/privacy-policy/

  • Terms of Use can be found at https://www.petinsurancequotes.com/terms-of-use/
sections.installation:
1. Install Pet Insurance Quotes via the WordPress plugin manager OR Install piq-quote.zip using the ‘Plugins’ interface in WordPress
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

To use the plugin with WordPress Blocks:
1. Place Pet Insurance Quotes block into your page or post from the “Embed” plugin section in the WordPress Blocks.
2. If you have an affiliate ID with PetInsuranceQuotes, you can add your affiliate ID in the block properties sidebar.

To use the plugin with Shortcode:
1. Add the following shortcode to your page or post where desired: [piq-quote]
2. If you have an affiliate ID with PetInsuranceQuotes, you can add your affiliate ID in the shortcode: [piq-quote affiliate-id=YOUR_AFFILIATE_ID]
sections.faq:
How do I use this plugin?

Install and activate the plugin via the installation instructions. When viewing the page where the form is embedded, simply fill out the form and click ‘Fetch Your Quotes’.
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

  • Added ability to add an affiliate ID to the embedded Pet Insurance Quotes form.

1.0.2

  • Adding a shortcode embed for the Pet Insurance Quotes plugin. For shortcode use, simply use the [piq-quote] shortcode.

1.0.1

  • Bug fixes

1.0.0

  • Plugin released.
